Summary: I was telling my friend that I photographed Jupiter the other day
divs: Sighting DetailsI was telling my friend that I photographed Jupiter the other day, and saw a bright star. I showed it to her, and talk that this one could be a planet or space station, because it was so bright. Then I stopped walking to check if it was stationary or not. Then the "bright star" just drew a path like a check sign and disappeared behind the buildings. The change of path was like it hit some wall & bounced..
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Istanbul
There were no other sightings in Istanbul on or around May 12th 2013
